ygData.subject: Re: Text colors
ygData.msgSnippet: In addition to this there is Eq client Colors editor on the EQ stratics network. Specifically:
ygData.messageBody:
In addition to this there is Eq client Colors
editor on the EQ stratics network.
Specifically:<br><a href=http://eq.stratics.com/content/info/custom_colors.shtml target=new>http://eq.stratics.com/content/info/custom_colors.shtml</a><br><br>It's a decent one and you don't have to worry about
cutting and pasting in the right place. Plus it lets you
look to see a little of what it might look like before
going into the game (from what I can
remember).<br><br>Or if you're the type that likes to do things
manually... I go into the EQsupp that patched recently. Then
I look to see what the text color I want to update
is called. (They're all numbered). Then I pull up
Powerpoint or some other RGB enabled program. Then I adjust
the RGB numbers in that program till it's the color I
like. Then I plug those numbers into the RGB 3 code for
that channel.<br><br>It's a lot easier than I'm
explaining it. But again, it's up to your preferences. Other
than a few settings changes the EQ color editor works
great. I've never tried the Caster site... but sure that
works as well.<br><br>shooman out<br><br>PS That EQ
supp explains pretty well how to edit your
EQclient.ini. I've tweaked these last two weeks my colors as
well as logging in with run turned on, etc.
